languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще секунду — а потом трясет головой, словно стряхивая морок.{/n} "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}едва не поддался{/d} старому трюку Архиврага... искушение недостижимым — главная из ловушек, что расставляет Хаос для душ людей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще секунду — а потом трясет головой, словно стряхивая морок.{/n} "Я едва не поддался старому трюку Архиврага... искушение недостижимым — главная из ловушек, что расставляет Хаос для душ людей".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще секунду — а потом трясет головой, словно стряхивая морок.{/n} "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}едва не поддался{/d} старому трюку Архиврага... искушение недостижимым — главная из ловушек, что расставляет Хаос для душ людей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I almost succumbed to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I almost succumbed to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I almost succumbed to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I almost succumbed to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，之后摇了摇头，仿佛在驱散精神中的迷雾一样。{/n}“无法获得之物的诱惑……我{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}差点{/d}就被混沌大敌的老把戏打败了。混沌会为毫无警觉的灵魂设下各种陷阱，这种陷阱是最常见的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，之后摇了摇头，仿佛在驱散精神中的迷雾一样。{/n}“无法获得之物的诱惑……我差点就被混沌大敌的老把戏打败了。混沌会为毫无警觉的灵魂设下各种陷阱，这种陷阱是最常见的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vacila durante un segundo más antes de sacudir la cabeza, como intentando despejar la niebla que cubre su mente.{/n} «He estado {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}cerca de sucumbir{/d} al truco más viejo del Archienemigo... la tentación de lo inalcanzable, la trampa más básica que prepara el Caos para las almas incautas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacila durante un segundo más antes de sacudir la cabeza, como intentando despejar la niebla que cubre su mente.{/n} «He estado cerca de sucumbir al truco más viejo del Archienemigo... la tentación de lo inalcanzable, la trampa más básica que prepara el Caos para las almas incautas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはもう1秒ほど考え込んだ後、心の霧を晴らすように頭を振った。{/n}「危うく渾沌の勢力の使い古された手管に{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}屈するところ{/d}でしたよ…手の届かぬものへの誘惑…渾沌が油断した魂に仕掛ける、あらゆる罠の中でも最もありふれたものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはもう1秒ほど考え込んだ後、心の霧を晴らすように頭を振った。{/n}「危うく渾沌の勢力の使い古された手管に{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}屈するところ{/d}でしたよ…手の届かぬものへの誘惑…渾沌が油断した魂に仕掛ける、あらゆる罠の中でも最もありふれたものです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schwankt noch eine Sekunde und schüttelt dann den Kopf, als würde er den Nebel in seinem Geist vertreiben.{/n} "Ich wäre fast auf den alten Trick des Erzfeinds {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hereingefallen{/d} ... die Anziehungskraft des Unerreichbaren – die wichtigste Falle des Chaos für alle ahnungslosen Seelen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schwankt noch eine Sekunde und schüttelt dann den Kopf, als würde er den Nebel in seinem Geist vertreiben.{/n} "Ich wäre fast auf den alten Trick des Erzfeinds hereingefallen ... die Anziehungskraft des Unerreichbaren – die wichtigste Falle des Chaos für alle ahnungslosen Seelen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hésite une seconde de plus, puis secoue la tête comme pour s'éclaircir les idées.{/n} « J'ai {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}bien failli me faire avoir{/d} par la vieille ruse du Grand Ennemi... L'appât de l'inaccessible, le premier des pièges que le Chaos tend aux âmes sans méfiance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hésite une seconde de plus, puis secoue la tête comme pour s'éclaircir les idées.{/n} « J'ai bien failli me faire avoir par la vieille ruse du Grand Ennemi... L'appât de l'inaccessible, le premier des pièges que le Chaos tend aux âmes sans méfiance. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir müddet daha sendeledikten sonra zihin bulanıklığından kurtulurmuşçasına başını sallıyor.{/n} "Neredeyse Şerbaşı'nın eski numaralarından birine {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}kanıyordum{/d}... Ulaşılmazın cazibesi. Kaos'un gafil ruhlara kurduğu tuzaklardan ilki."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another second, then shakes his head as though clearing away mental fog.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}almost succumbed{/d} to the Archenemy's old trick... the lure of the unattainable — the primary of all the traps that Chaos sets for unwary souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bir müddet daha sendeledikten sonra zihin bulanıklığından kurtulurmuşçasına başını sallıyor.{/n} “Neredeyse Şerbaşı’nın eski numaralarından birine düşüyordum... Ulaşılmazın cazibesi. Kaos’un gafil ruhlara kurduğu tuzaklardan ilki.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
